metadata.synopsis: Jaheira comments about returning to a mindflayer colony, which Laez'al, Wyll and Astarion comment on. It's mentioned that this is Jaheira reflecting on coming to one of these with Abdel Adrian,
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Enter the colony past the first membrane with the mentioned party

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Of all the beastly lairs I've had to poke my nose into - an illithid colony is still by far the worst.
1.context: InternalNodeContext:  Referencing Bhaalspawn/Abdel (Unsure if it's a canon adventure? Might be)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I think we have more pressing concerns than a trip down memory lane.
